mapper.sql: PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, STATUS, PRODUCT_TYPE, STANDARD_PRICE_RATE, PLATFONT_PRICE_RATE, FLOOR_PRICE_RATE, YEAR_INTEREST_DAYS, REPAY_TYPE, INTEREST_TYPE, LOAN_TERM, REPAY_CYCLE_TYPE, REPAY_CYCLE_NUM, REPAY_DAY_TYPE, RATE_TYPE, REPAY_DAY, TOTAL_LIMIT, PLATFONT_LIMIT, FLOOR_LIMIT, GUARANTY_TYPE, IS_LOOP, IS_REPAY, IS_FIX_PAY, REPAY_RESOURCE_TYPE, PENALTY_INTEREST_RATE, GRACE_PERIOD, ADVANCE_END_PERIOD, CUST_LABLE, MARKET_LABEL, PRIORITY, DELAY_DAYS, LOAN_START_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, LESSEE_ID, SERVICE_RATE, part_repay_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_product_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_product_info (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, STATUS, PRODUCT_TYPE, STANDARD_PRICE_RATE, PLATFONT_PRICE_RATE, FLOOR_PRICE_RATE, YEAR_INTEREST_DAYS, REPAY_TYPE, INTEREST_TYPE, LOAN_TERM, REPAY_CYCLE_TYPE, REPAY_CYCLE_NUM, REPAY_DAY_TYPE, RATE_TYPE, REPAY_DAY, TOTAL_LIMIT, PLATFONT_LIMIT, FLOOR_LIMIT, GUARANTY_TYPE, IS_LOOP, IS_REPAY, IS_FIX_PAY, REPAY_RESOURCE_TYPE, PENALTY_INTEREST_RATE, GRACE_PERIOD, ADVANCE_END_PERIOD, CUST_LABLE, MARKET_LABEL, PRIORITY, DELAY_DAYS, LOAN_START_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, LESSEE_ID, SERVICE_RATE, part_repay_flag ) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{standardPriceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{platfontPriceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{floorPriceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{yearInterestDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loanTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCycleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{repayCycleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repayDayType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{repayDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platfontLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{floorLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{guarantyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isLoop,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isRepay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isFixPay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{repayResourceType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{penaltyInterestRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gracePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advanceEndPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custLable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delayDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loanStartType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lesseeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{partRepayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )
